headline: Stanley Black & Decker Leadership Shift Puts Valuation And Governance In Focus
summary: Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE:SWK) has named Francesca Campbell as Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary. Debra Crew has been selected as incoming Chair of the Board, expected to take the role in October 2026. Shane M. O'Kelly has joined the Board of Directors, bringing additional executive experience to the company. Stanley Black & Decker, known for its tools, storage, and industrial products, is adjusting its leadership structure at a time when many manufacturers...

headline: Does Stanley Black & Decker’s (SWK) Board Refresh Quietly Redefine Its Long‑Term Governance Playbook?
summary: Stanley Black & Decker recently announced a series of leadership changes, including appointing Francesca Campbell as Senior Vice President, General Counsel and Corporate Secretary effective February 16, and reshaping its Board with Debra Crew set to become Chair in October 2026 and Shane M. O'Kelly joining as a director. These moves bring in extensive legal, governance, and supply chain expertise, potentially influencing how the company manages risk, capital allocation, and long-term...

headline: Stanley Black & Decker (SWK) To Report Earnings Tomorrow: Here Is What To Expect
summary: Manufacturing company Stanley Black & Decker (NYSE:SWK) will be announcing earnings results this Wednesday before market open. Here’s what to look for.
